title: New: R O Z E S – Everything
body:
Pulling in Bel Heir and ARNOLD on production duties, Philadelphia’s **R O Z E S** impresses on her debut track, that’s unmistakably ‘now’ sounding.

Placing herself alongside the likes of JUDE. with the Lorde-esque songwriting, it may be a sound that’s inherently cool at this moment in time, yet that’s not to say R O Z E S doesn’t do it very well. Check out _Everything_ below.
